Plot: A 14-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials "M.J." inside.
Title: Like Mike
Writer: Michael Elliot (story), Michael Elliot (screenplay), Jordan Moffet (screenplay)
Actors: Shad Moss, Morris Chestnut, Jonathan Lipnicki, Brenda Song
tomatoConsensus: A pleasant and innocuous diversion for kids, but adults may have trouble sitting through the movie's predictable plotlines and schmaltz.
